choices: A scientist for The Claw Labs came to visit me
1.content:
My name is Mark,Mark North,and you,my dear reader,are going to read about me,my life and some of my deepest secrets and obsessions...including Chloe...But first,an announcement:all of the written here,believe it or not,happened.But you are not going to tell people it is (unless you want to go to a mental hospital) cos' nobody will trust you.Well,lets begin...
One in a thousand newborn children,a special DNA chain mutates in a very special way:That DNA is bonded to a material,and the children born with the mutations can manipulate the material at will:this children are known as manipulators.
As you may have guessed,I am one of them,linked with the fat.Any fat.
Obviously,the government couldnt let children like these free,specially when they couldn't control themselves.In the Pacific Ocean,near the Feroe islands,there was a secret research facility...where the manipulators were raised:The Claw Labs
There,we learned to control ourselves,and the scientists taught us how to make a good use of our power for society.They made carbon manipulators jewellers;fire manipulators fire fighters and so on.After that,the governments buy the manipulators,so our nacionalities matches the buyer country,from where we cant leave,and there,they do their jobs(which usually can only be done by us,or jobs in which we excel)
But there were 2 special and uncommon exceptions,for being incredible useful to the governments and for being even more rare to find:fat and water manipulators.
Unluckily to water manipulators,they were used as weapons of mass destruction,modifying the water and creating ice-nine.If you dont know what it is,look at wikipedia,I don't want to waste my ink.
Fat manipulators,on the other hand,hand the fate of becoming assasins by creating hearth attacks,the kill always passed unnoticed.For the nature of the job,we were living camouflaged.
So,when I was 20,working for the USA...
1.title: The Begining

choices: Blonde hair, blue eyes, with an olive complexion.
Green eyes, brown hair, and a pale complexion
Brown eyes, brown hair, with the a swimmer's body.
Grey eyes, black hair with unnatural highlights, & a QB's stature.
Hazel eyes, baby face, and brown hair - average build.
11.content:
I saw a man walking down the street, with color-changing hair. It was faint, but as a special agent - attention to detail was an important element.
As I saw him grow half an inch with the next 3 steps, I caught up to him.

"Hey, you need to play it more low key, buddy" I whispered, walking with him.
"What are you talking about?" the man added.
"It's not exactly inconspicuous if you change too much too soon. The hair was subtle, but," I scoffed, trailing off.
"Yeah, whatever, dude... I don't get your game here," he added, either playing dumb or being clueless.
"You don't even know, do you?" I asked, seeing his face dumbstruck...
"Well then, grab some lunch with me. Apparently you haven't been properly educated!"

We passed into a nearby cafe, bakery.
As I looked his average build up and down, I decided I'd give him a hook to keep him interested - adding 40 pounds directly to his belly, which now hung out of the bottom of his shirt.

"Maybe you should grab some pastries, tubby, looks like you could use some refreshments after all that walking!" you tease, jiggling his newfound belly.
"WHAT THE..." He trailed off before turning red, covering his face, and grunting slightly... and just like that, belly gone.
I thought I'd met my match. Have I met my match? I thought He can control genes!?
"Oh my, so you do know!" I mentioned, before asking, "So what's your name?"
"I've chosen the name Gene, fittingly... Heh, you got me" he admitted, "I thought I'd stayed off the radar though. Damn."
"Let's get some coffee and talk then..."
Could it be? I thought I've only met one gene-manipulator before, among those with the mutation, this was the crown jewel - changing any and everything about a person was a very cherished power.

-------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------


"Well my name used to be Chloe, before I changed my sex and image to evade searches" he trailed, looking down.
"That's fine by me," I added, "What has your life as a renegade been like?"
"I've been so bored, because it's become so easy to slip past these government baboons!"
"Heh. Care to give me a make-over, so I can at least dodge them for the sake of this?"
"Okay, come with me to the bathroom then."

I decided, I'd always wanted to look...
11.title: His name was Gene

choices: Tried to Gather information about the Titanium manipulator
Look for the Claw Labs information
New Country,new face...I could just live here
13.content:
Yup,you read right.It all began with the end of the human genome project II.
It was meant to discover how the manipulator's DNA worked,modify it,and improve it.All this research was made by The Claw Labs,and that investigation allowed them to make synthetic manipulators(who have never appeared).But all the data was stolen;a north korean spy was able to get all the info.That was a very dangerous situation:If North Korea was able to decode the information.A plutonium manipulator would be able to make nuclear weapons explode,and ice-9 manipulators would be even more deadlier.
The world vs north corea...
You might thing that the world crushed north corea instantly...but that wasnt the case.
In the latest years,North Corea was the country which more manipulators had bought,but that information was classified so i couldnt see all of them.
They had the titanium manipulator thats all I knew.With control over that overused metal,North corea left most weapons and vehicles render useless.
Not being able to get through,the sent me,the silent killer to get rid of him,and after that,they would nuke the whole country.Yup,with me in there.I accepted the job.I wish I hadnt
So,I entered the North Korea frontier.When some soldiers came,i killed them all,took their clothes and reestructured the body fat of my face to change it.It wasnt a piece of art,but it did its job.
After entering,I...
13.title: The III world war began

14.content:
"Where am I?"
The last thing I remembered was getting into my car after work. My job was a fitness trainer although it was a cover for my top secret work for the government as an assassin. My ability to manipulate fat allowed me to maintain an impressive phsyique with 4% body fat but more important by manipulating the fat levels of other people within range I could push them past healthy limits, in other words kill them. This might seem cruel but I'd been in training for years. I accepted what I do and the idea that some people need to die for the good of mankind. I didn't think much about it.
There was no answer. I was in a small room. There was a bed, a chair a sink and toilet. I was lying on the bed trying to remember what had happened. The door opened and a man entered. He was an older man- maybe 45 and good looking although
14.title: I was kidnapped

141.content: "Mark," the man said settling him bulk into the chair. "I'm sorry I had to meet with you this way but I felt that this was the only way to get my proposition to your attention. I won't tell you my name just now because I don't want the consequences if you don't want to work with me. I have a proposition which I think you will find attractive, especially since the government pretty much controlls you. I'd like to gove you an option- a very lucrative option and one which will let you control your life instead of being a government pawn. Wouldn't you like that? Get yourself a decent apartment, a nice car, travel- and, by the way- stop killing people. Interested?"
141.title: Carrying a sagging gut

1413.content:
"Tell me your proposition." I wasn't really interested in what this man had to say. I'd been trained to expect this kind of approach. Although I was undercover, I had been warned that there were other organizations that would spare no effort to turn me to their advantage. I'd also been indoctrinated to view anyone that contacted me in this way as evil. My country was counting on me to maintain order in the world at any cost. Killing a few people who were working to subvert our effort was a small price.
"Well, it's pretty much what I already told you. I'm offering you an opportunity to use your talent for good instead of evil and make some good money to boot. How much do they pay you?"
"That's classified information." I replied. I was lying. I was getting standard government pay at a pretty low level. Just about enough to pay for my studion apratment and Make payments on a Honda Civic. The training I received had conditioned me to live a Spartan lifestyle. I dated onve in a while even though my ripped phsyqie attracted the women. I didn't want a relationship because of my secret life as an assassin. Once in a while I'd find myself envying the normal lifestyle of my clients or fellow trainers but my mission was important. My country needed me.
"I'm guessing that you don't make more that $30k. And if you do make more than $30k you can't spend it without compromising your cover. Have you ever wondered what it would be like to travel first class? Enjoy life?"
"My job is very fulfilling," I responded.
My new friend settled himself in the chair. I noticed how his belly bowed our stretching his shirtfront. I imagined taking control of my adversary pumping up his fat and watching his belly grow out to fill the chair. Then he surprised me. He told me that my last job, presented to me as rliminating an enemy of freedom had actually made my boss a rich man when he shortsold the stock in his company, The man was totally apolitical.
"You're lying," I told him and pumped his fat level up to 25%, watching a double chin grow while gaps formed between the buttons on his dress shirt.
"I'm not your enemy, Mark. I can prove what I say is true. And by the way, your talent is quite impressive. We discussed how to approach you and decided that as the fatest member of management, you might not make me fatter. I wasn't prepared."
The man struggled to unbuckle his belt and unbutton his pants at which point his belly popped shirt buttons.
"Whew," the man sighed. "What a relief."
"Well." he stood up keeping his pants from falling off with one hand, "I'm going to let you think about his and find myself a new wardrobe. He held out an envelope. "Here is the proof of what I told you. Read it and we will talk later."
The man turned and waddled to the door.
I looked at the envelope. It was all bullshit I knew but maybe I should read it anyway.
1413.title: I'm listening, tell me more.

14132.content:
Part of my training had been meditation. Leaving the envelope on the bed I assumed a lotus position to wait for whatever woud happen next.
The door opend and my newly fat friend was back barely fitting into some khakis that were covered by an overhanding belly. He waddled over to the chair and sat, belly flowing down between his fat thighs. He was panting from the effort.
"You know your business." The man began. "You made me fat as a hog but even worse, you have given me an addition to fat. I crave it constantly and there is not way I contol myself. You have a great talent."
My fat friend paused.
"I took a big chance because I hoped we might make a good team. Looks like I lose. Here's what's going to happen. We are going to let you go. It was never part of the plan to hurt you or cooerce you. Only to make you a proposition. Clearly you aren't interested. It think it's your loss but that's only my opinion. We won;t drug you but I would like to blindflold you until we get you back to your car. I know we overstepped by kidnapping you and I understand wanting payback but perhaps you will consider reverting my body back to my old weight. I've got a wife and two kids to support and I'm not going to last long the way I am."
I com[lied. Fatty loaded me in a car and after 30 minute or so it stopped.
"Take off you blindfold Mark. Your car is over there. I'm sorry we won't be working together. I'll leave this envelope with you in case you want to check it out later. I've left you my telephone number and there is $10k to compensate you for the incovenience. Take care."
Fatty was even bigger now with a triple chin. He extended a fleshy hand. "No hard feelings?"
I knew he was hoping for a reprieve from death by fat. Normally I didn't revert my changes but somehow this was different. I hadn't been hurt or threatened and I had a $10k bonus for the inconvenience.
"No hard feelings." I said and reversed his fat level to a stable
14132.title: Mark doesn't read the information

choices: No,I've never seen this man before.
141321.content:
"I really appreciate it.I really hope that you reconsider our offer" -He said,as I left.
The next week passed without any special event,and I was wondering how I wanted
to live for the rest of my life.Day after day,the same shit.Killing and helping people with his fat problems...
Not an ideal life,right?
But before I could make up my mind,two black cars stopped in front of my house.-As the government never changed their
official cars,I knew who were coming out of the cars:The NSA,or National Security Agency.
When they got out of the car,I was starting to freak out...as they are the executors of the manipulators who don´t want to work for the goverment.
I never knew how,but no manipulator killed a single one of these agents.
"Mark,right? We have some questions we want you to answer"-asked the first agent-"Have you met this man?".she said,showing a blurred photo of the man who kidnapped me.
I still dont know why,but I thought my answer would determine the rest of my life forever.

1413211.content:
"I don't think so. Is he a target?"
"He's been snooping around. He seemed to be watching you and then you were out of circulation for a few hours. You know we have to keep track of you 24/7. It's for your protection. Where were you on March 7? "
March 7 was when I was kidnapped. I could either confess and let the men in black worry about it or come up with a story. Lately, I'd been more and more uncomftable with my supposed benefactors. I decided to lie.
"I went off the grid." I said, not sure where this might go. I knew they could check any story about where I was so it needed to be something that only I could corroborate.
"Sometimes this job gets to me and I need to get my head straight. I go into my closet and meditate. I need to get away from people just clean out my head."
"You know we've got a shrink for you to use?"
Like I'd trust their shrink.
"I just clear my mind. It's the best thing for me. I think I was in a trace for 12 hours or so."
The men in black nodded and left. I didn't know whether they were off my case or not. I didn't want to leave the comfort of the program but I was beginning to worry that continuing was safe. Perhaps I should consider the offer more seriously. should I call?
1413211.title: No,I've never seen this man before.

14132111.content:
I bought one of those throwaway cellphones and called the guy. Tried to be lighthearted by asking him ifhe was controlling his weight these days. He chuckled but then I got serious. Told him I was worried about my handlers and whether they would take care of me like they said or just take care of me. I asked how I could ever get away from them and be safe from retaliation. I asked them what good it would do me to have lots of money if I was afraid to spend it. Would I have to stay in hiding for the rest of my life. I listened to the answers. Bottom line, I was flying blind. They had answers but how could I know the truth. The government had its grubby fingers in everything these days. Finally I decided. I could hardly stand my life so what could I possibly lose by going rougue?
I followed their instructions. Played it cool for a week while I got ready, Then I made my move.
I had picked out my decoy at a food court nearby. He was a real fatty about my height and coloring making the rounds of his favorite fast food joints pretty much everyday. I planned to intercept him and get him into the janitor's closet near the restrooms, adjust his fat level to mine, swap clothes with him and then adjust my own fat level to his before leaving him dazed and confused. It turned out to be easier than I expected. Once I'd adjusted him from 350 pounds of fatty to 170 pounds it was easy to get the clothes off. I left my clothes in a pile and as I adjusted up to superfat, I put on his clothes. Leaving him unconsious, lean and naked on the floor, I waddled out to the food court sure that no one would recognize me.
Now that I'd managed to go off the radar, I needed to get to the safe house where my new employers would take over. I couldn't take my car so
14132111.title: Yes, make the call

141321111.content:
After 2 hours of boredom switching buses to make sure nobody was following me,I arrived to the directions that Erik (I didn't know his name yet,but I lovely nicknamed Fatty.) gave me.
It seemed like an isolated place in the middle of the city;some grass and a few bushes over there.I must admit that I got a bit anxious...I wondered that maybe if all this was a nasty plot to see my loyality to the government,Obviously,if that were the case,I wouldn't be able to tell you now XD.
Well,so,as Fatty instructed me,I phoned him.
I couldn't hold my breath when in 2 seconds,the whole place changed in a matter of seconds.
A huge tower;completely made of metal appeared in front of my eyes(well,I appeared in front of the tower,but I didn't know that yetThen,Fatty appeared.
-Oh,Mark,I knew you would came.Impressive,right?just by combining the power of 2 manipulators and a bit of technology,we have developed teletransportation.
Its was your first warp jump,so you may feel a bit...oh well.
I didn't need to know that.After 2 hours of bus and a jump at warp speed,my stomatch couldn't take it any more,and threw up.That was one of the worst times of my life.Of course,I aimed at Fatty.
-A little resentful,arent you?I think I will need a new pair of shoes...
after I felt a bit better,we entered to the tower,The Needle.
-Well,well here we are.I think It's time introduce you to the rest of the manipulators here...but first,let me introduce myself,as now we can talk without fear of being heard.The others still need to recover from teleporting you.
.As he spoke,I looked at him and analysed him-just like we were taught as childs.
at first glance,he seemed like a 40 years old man,but the little scars on his face revealed the truth;there were signs of nano-surgery on the body.Those little nanobots generate body tissue at great speed,so I had no idea of his true age;maybe 45,maybe 90,as he chose the appearence he wanted.His complexion was weak,like the rat books who doesn´t exercise well,nor eat properly,just like a lab director would seem,but without any doubt,the most remarkable thing was on his right hand:a luxurious black ring of pure rodium! And it had a diamond with the form of a crow claw on it.
-This is The Black Claw-Fatty told me,as he noticed me staring at it-It's the only bequest of our family,the Claw family.
I am Erik,ex-director and former creator of The Claw Labs.Nice to meet you.

I...
141321111.title: I caught* the bus.

choices: the devious route by was of the food court.
141321112.content:
I was breathing heavy as I waddled down the street to the subway. Every step caused my belly to sway. I had never been so awary of my body as with those extra pounds that were right now my only definse against my old employers. I was on my own. and starting a new life. Startin down the subway stairs I looked down. All I could see was the expanse of my expanded middle. My hand clutching the handrail was pudgy. I had my pass and squeezed through the turnstile. I'd never thought about them before but today instead of pushing the bar with my hip, it was my belly that made contact. It was a close fit. Now which way should I go? Direct to my destination or indirectly. Since I was short of breath and panting from all the extra weight, I sat down on a bench to recover. Sitting was strange because of the bag of fat resting on my thighs. I still didn't believe it was real. I patted it carefully. I could feel it move. It was definitely part of me. Cautiously I stuffed my hands into the pouch of my hoodie and grabbed its mass. Inside I discovered that my fat friend had a stash of candy bars. I couldnt resist. I ate them all.
As I ate I was studying the people on the platform. Nobody seemed suspicious. Nobody seemed to be waiting for me to make a move. I finished the candy bars and was surprised that I was hungry for more. I began to wonder if there would be food when I got to my safe house. I finally decided to get moving. I took
141321112.title: I took the subway.

1413211122.content:
Feeling pretty confident about my disguise and surprisingly hungry, I decided that I might as well stop in the food court for a snack. Ten minutes later I'd discovered that my new size had affected my appetite as well. I'd ordered a Big Mac meal regular size which was gone in seconds leaving me as hungry as before. Next round I uped the order to super size and I was still hungry. Maybe a pizza would fill me. I ordered two slices. Still hungry asked for two more. Moved on to Subway and went for a footlong. Finally my hunger was relieved but to be sure I stopped at Baskin Robbins for a banana split.
Finally full, I traveled the rest of the way to the safe house. I didn't know what to expect but I was looking forward to returning to normal.
1413211122.title: the devious route by was of the food court.

1413212.content:
Why would I lie?After all I was working for the good guys,right?
I saw her plate again to make sure she wasnt a enemy:NSA Codename:Chloe.
I told them all I knew abut the man,and even told them about the dossier he gave me.
"Have you seen the content of this files?"-She asked me,with an icy glare.
"No,I have never opened this folder"-I said
"I don´t know why I bother asking;I'll have to kill you anyway.Too bad;You were kinda cute.
fast as the wind,she took her knife and beheaded me.In my last seconds of awarenessI tried to manipulate her,but oddly enough,It didn´t work at all.
And thats how I died.

The End 1:Beheaded
1413212.title: Explain the whole story

info.brief_description:
Follow the story of Mark,able to control fat.
A little challenging to write.
info.description:
The rulz:
1-Freedom! Write whatever you want,as long as it doesnt break the tempo of the story
2-you cant write however you want:You can only use 1st person.I know its tricky.
3-no ultra-short chapters

You shall pass now
